                               Description
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
An eighteen-year-old high school girl is left at home by her parents and she
decides to have a slumber party. There is friction between some of the invited
guests and the new girl, who is better at basketball than they, so the new
girl decides to stay at home (which is conveniently across the street from
the host&#039;s house). Meanwhile, a murderer of five people with a propensity for
power tools has escaped and is at large, and eventually makes his way to the
party, where the guests begin experiencing an attrition problem, with only
the new girl to help them.
